title: Hime to Knight to, Tonari no Watashi.
original_name: 姫とナイトと、となりの私。
sinopse:
The one I'm falling in love with isn't my knight but I can't seem to forget about him... Just what should I do with these feelings of mine?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shots:
Bokura no Koi no Yamai
Seitokaishitsu, Megane no Uso. - Kare ga Doku wo Haku Riyuu (Student Council Office: The Lies of the Glasses)
